title: Toothbrush holder
subTitle: Your toothbrush also needs a home

marketingArguments.title: Biodegradable & sustainable
marketingArguments.speech: 100% made of bamboo: Bamboo is an environmentally sustainable material, the world's fastest naturally renewing resource. It can be added to your home compost when you no longer use it but it won't be soon!

marketingArguments.title: Anti-microbial and anti-bacterial
marketingArguments.speech: Natural power of the bamboo will keep the place clean of any indesirable.
